div.p: A lymph node area or nodal group; a subdivision of the entire lymphatic system. For breast cancer, this includes 5 areas: internal mammary lymph nodes, axillary lymph nodes level I, II, and III, and the supraclavicular lymph nodes.

publisher.value: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative

description.value: A lymph node area or nodal group; a subdivision of the entire lymphatic system. For breast cancer, this includes 5 areas: internal mammary lymph nodes, axillary lymph nodes level I, II, and III, and the supraclavicular lymph nodes.
